list.title: checkSizeOfStack
list.description: Compare the number of `cards` with the given `stackSize`.

list.title: getItem
list.description: Retrieve card from `cards` array at the 0-based `position`.

list.title: insertItemAtBottom
list.description: Insert `newCard` at beginning of the `cards` array.

list.title: insertItemAtTop
list.description: Insert newCard at the end of the cards array.

list.title: removeItem
list.description: Remove the card at the 0-based position.

list.title: removeItemAtBottom
list.description: Remove card from the beginning of the `cards`.

list.title: removeItemFromTop
list.description: Remove card from the end of the `cards` array.
